title: Character & Service
heading: What I Stand For
subheading: How I try to give back and the values that guide me.

values.title: Team First
values.description: Success is measured by what we achieve together.

values.title: Accountability
values.description: Hold myself to high standards on and off the court.

values.title: Family
values.description: Everything starts with the people who support me.

service.title: Youth Basketball Camps
service.description: Volunteer coach for elementary players, teaching fundamentals and helping young athletes develop a love for the game.

service.title: Food Drive
service.description: Organized collection for local shelter, working with teammates to give back to our community.

leadership: Mentor for incoming freshmen on varsity

testimonial.quote: Kevin leads by example. He's the first one in the gym and the last to leave. His work ethic is contagious.
